ReAbout.title: How SECOM Protects You
ReAbout.desc:
SECOM goes beyond alarms.
We combine smart technology with human response to truly protect what matters most.

items.title: Instantly spots intrusions, fire, or suspicious activity, even when you're not home.
We only view live video during emergencies, ensuring safety without compromising your privacy.
In a emergency, we don't wait. Our physical response personnel is on the ground. Fast.

ReSolution.title: Secure Every Corner of Your Home
ReSolution.desc: Each room has different risks. SECOM helps you place the right protection in the right place.

itemSlider.title:
Smart Video Camera - Outdoor
Monitor your gates, garage, and yard with smart detection and two-way audio.

PIR Cam Indoor - Living Room
Watch over your home's central space with reliable motion-sensing protection.

Door Contact - Windows
Protect windows from silent entry with smart magnetic sensors.

Smoke Detector - Clean Kitchen
Even in the cleanest kitchens, accidents can happen. Stay alert with a smoke detector.
